articles.title: RuinsMagus - Launch Trailer - IGN
articles.description: RuinsMagus is available now on Meta Quest 2 and Steam VR headsets. Watch the launch trailer for this anime-inspired VR action JRPG and get ready to explore the abandoned ruins below the prosperous town of Grand Amnis.
